overview:
I’m Sherief Mamoon

I will not talk about myself

because I feel I’m nothing if I haven’t something to do So I will talk about what I’m working on (or hope to do) in my life

I have made a website (www.TareqNa.com Ø·Ø±ÙŠÙ‚Ù†Ø§), this website’s idea is based on the short story (one page story) which gives you an important principles and basics to live with in your life, so you can find your way to success (the real success).. and the good thing in this idea is that any story in TareqNa.com is toooooo short (it’s just one page), so you can read it in less than three minutes, and never feel weariness and for that reason, I named it (one page story)

this website ( God willing ) will play an effective role in the Egyptian society, that’s because the main target of TareqNa.com is helping everyone who is searching for the right way to the real success, the real success that Allah (sob7anaho wa ta3ala) wants from us.

So, TareqNa.com founded to show you how to get this success, how to wake up your conscience, how to make your mind, how to see the world, how to deal with others, how to take a decision, how to understand, how to obey Allah, how to be happy, how to love, how to feel, how to live..

TareqNa.com is not a project for making money it’s a first step project for making minds and hearts or so I hope

TareqNa.com always needs everyone who can help, everyone who can suggest ideas, everyone who can share So don’t hesitate to contact me You are always welcome
